name: LAST LIFE STANDING
description:
Project Description

LAST LIFE STANDING is a slow-paced wave shooter created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The topic was "Only One". 

Gameplay Your Goal

The goal for the player is to survive as long as possible.

Just one Resource

In order to survive, you have just one resource. LIFE. Every shot will cost you LIFE and you will get damage by the enemies.

More Problems

That is not all you have to deal with. Every time you lose a life point, your character's body will grow. Find a way to get smaller and make it easier for you to doge away from the enemies.

If you only have one LIFE left, survive as long as you can. A power shot will charge up which you are only able to use with your last LIFE.

Controls FUNCTIONKEYMovementW | A | S | DShootingLeft Mouse Button Feedback

Feel free to share your thoughts in the comment section, since I am still eager to learn and improve.
